title: Emerald Radiance Diamond Haaram: A Modern Take on Timeless Telugu Elegance
materials: Natural Emeralds (Estimated 5.7 ct total weight). Features a high-luster Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This exquisite Haaram seamlessly blends traditional design with modern aesthetics. The necklace showcases a geometric diamond pattern, reminiscent of 'Lakshmi Kasu Mala' motifs, leading to a central floral pendant adorned with emeralds. Fine filigree detailing and delicate gold bead dangles (gundla) add a touch of South Indian charm. The pendant design incorporates intricate openwork showcasing traditional craftsmanship.
colors: Predominantly gold and sparkling white diamonds
with vibrant green emerald accents. The contrast creates a captivating visual appeal.
occasions: and high-end social gatherings. A statement piece ideal for muhurtham or an upscale cocktail event.
description: A unique fusion of classic and contemporary design, this Haaram represents the pinnacle of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The brilliant diamonds and rich emeralds create a luxurious and eye-catching piece. Its enduring value and striking beauty make it a treasured heirloom. Handcrafted by skilled artisans.
